name: How to connect to a device

step.name: Preparations
step.text: You want to connect from device A to device B. Get ready both devices.

step.name: Device B
step.text: Open AirSend app, go to Connections section and swipe up or tap 'This device'.

step.name: Device A
step.text: Open AirSend app, go to Connections section and tap 'Connect'.

step.name: Last step
step.text: Scan the QR code or enter IP adress and port.
